nodes.text: The Strategic Command Walker was a two-legged combat walker designed by Juvard Illip Oggurobb for use by commanders of the Eternal Alliance. The walker combined Zakuul weaponry—two side-mounted laser cannons and a smaller, chin-mounted laser cannon—with Galactic Republic surveillance technology to form an effective mobile command headquarters.

The Strategic Command Walker was released on April 4, 2017 as part of the 5.1 patch for Star Wars: The Old Republic, costing 50,000 credits or 1,500 Cartel Coins. The walker is part of the Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion.
